review: It gets the job done for streaming but all the shows & movies that come with it are either extremely old, unheard of, or you have to pay for them.
author: Kristen Clester

review: Really easy setup, Easy operation. I Wish Amazon had more current content.Free shipping, free music,books and video! Amazon prime is the best.
author: Big Pa

review: The Fire TV stick has been working well for us. I got it on the SlingTV offer to suplement the the Fire TV box I had purchased earler. While no solution is really simple when it comes to cord cutting, this has made the transition easier. With the content from Amazon, Sling and Kodi this is a much better deal.The only thing I wish the Fire TV stick and box had would be a way to customize the home screen natively to the firmware. There is an app but it is unreliable.
author: steveb

review: amazing, may have to cancel my cable now. I only watch this now
author: bob hood

review: One of the best Amazon devices. It has made things way easier for me and i recommend them to everyone.
author: Zachary Klein

review: I don't know how the cable company is going to survive with the fire stick on the market. I love it and I got rid of cable.
author: kjanai
